title: Software Engineer
description: As a software developer at MercadoLibre, I contributed to the dynamic and challenging MercadoShops project, enhancing the platform with innovative solutions. Being part of MercadoLibre went beyond contributing to e-commerce success; it meant impacting millions and fostering my professional and technical growth in an innovative and excellent environment.

title: Software Engineer
description: At Cenora, a startup revolutionizing content management, I developed a web scraper for a leading company, extracting and organizing data into templates. Additionally, contributed to the Microsites project, overseeing frontend, backend, and database aspects, ensuring effective creation and management of micro sites with advanced tracking capabilities.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: As a Software Engineer, I've played a key role in various projects, focusing on automating internal business processes. Leveraging Microsoft's ASP.Net for robust Backend development, I integrated it seamlessly with a dynamic JavaScript Frontend, all supported by a structured Microsoft SQL database. This holistic approach ensures efficient and streamlined solutions.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description: As a Full-Stack Web Developer at LookAtMe Ventures, I led the development of vital apps: Data-Collector, a NodeJs/Express server employing Test-Driven development for data aggregation from major marketing services, and I-BOARDS, tracking KPIs for digital marketing campaigns across diverse channels.
